title.native: ありふれた職業で世界最強 3rd season
title.romaji: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou 3rd season
title.english: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest Season 3

description:
The third season of Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou.

En route to conquer a Great Labyrinth with his allies and former classmates, Hajime Nagumo is sidetracked by a tragedy that befalls his party member Shea Haulia. After encountering a group of rabbitmen caught in an ambush, Nagumo learns that members of Shea's Haulia Tribe have been abducted by soldiers of the Hoelscher Empire. To alleviate the anxiety of Shea, whose father may be in mortal danger, Nagumo decides to head toward the empire and rescue the missing Haulias. After arriving at his destination, Hajime is caught up in political turmoil between the empire and the Heiligh Kingdom. As princess Liliana S. B. Heiligh tries to formalize an alliance with the empire to protect her weakened kingdom against demon attacks, the Haulia Tribe plans to assassinate Emperor Gahard D. Hoelscher to free all rabbitmen from the empire's threat. Determined to protect his allies at any cost, Hajime will need to ignore all political considerations and unleash his unstoppable power on anyone who may stand in his way.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: อาชีพกระจอกแล้วทำไม ยังไงข้าก็เทพ ภาค 3

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Software Development
tags.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

node.description:
__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MindaRynOfficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mindaryn_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mindaryn_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/MindaRyn/)

A Thai YouTuber known for singing anisong covers. She has gone on to perform the theme songs to several anime series.

__Mike McFarland__ is an American voice actor, ADR Director, Script, and Line Producer at Funimation Entertainment.

Guilherme de Barros is a Brazilian actor and voice actor.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/guimarques78/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/guimarques78)

Guilherme Marques is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and architect.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Dickon Tarly (Game of Thrones)
- Antonio Garcia / Gold Samurai Ranger (2nd voice; Power Rangers: Samurai)
- Shisui Uchiha (Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 and Naruto X Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections)
- Mr. Phillip Frond (2nd voice - 2nd season onwards; Bob's Burgers)
- Travis Marshall (Dexter)
- Pietro Maximoff / Quiksilver (LEGO Marvel's Avengers)
- Joseph Turner (Call of Duty: WWII)
- George Takei (2nd voice; Futurama)
- Harald Fairhair (Assassin's Creed Valhalla)
- Chief (2nd dub; The Fox and the Hound)
- Amang Paso and Bantay (Trese)
- Sergeant Kong Chul-Ho (Descendants of the Sun)
- Joseph Campbell (Rick and Morty)
- Ricpon (Power Rangers Ninja Steel)
- David Hasselhoff (Close Enough)
!~

[YouTube](https://youtube.com/@iscream_ldh?si=yqBG-rEJKv53_qhH) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0e5pQ7WhkRfa6kEhzjQ9Bx?si=oEaLy2bQRfuzdSVYvQv2VQ) | [Twitter](twitter.com/iscream_ldh) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/iscream__official?igsh=a2U2cjk1ODdtcDRs) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@iscream__official) | [Website](https://www.iscream-official.com/)



iScream is a Japanese vocal and dance girl group under the talent agency LDH JAPAN. The trio consists of RUI, YUNA and HINATA — all of whom were contestants in LDH Presents THE GIRLS AUDITION held in 2018. In this audition featuring various divisions of the entertainment field, RUI became one of the winners under the vocal/dance category, while the other two were a part of the finalists. After the audition concluded, a training camp was held to asses the unsuccessful finalists for further three rounds. It was through this second selection process that YUNA and HINATA got chosen. The three girls came together to form the group iScream in 2019, but their debut got delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Finally in June of 2021, they debuted with the EP "Maybe...YES."

Although "iScream" appears to be a very much English sounding name, it's actually a wordplay that makes use of both English and Japanese languages. The "i" in iScream not only means oneself, it's also a play on the Japanese word for love, 愛 (ai). The name alludes to "scream love" or 愛を叫ぶ (ai wo sakebu), making them known to the Japanese audience also as アイサケ (AiSake) for short.

Prior to joining iScream, all the three girls attended LDH's performing arts school, EXPG. RUI and YUNA were also members of the EXPG Lab's project group KIZZY, while HINATA hoped that the audition would earn her the opportunity to get into the group, as she didn't even think she'd make it that far in the first place. With their backgrounds as EXPG students, the three of them excel at both singing and dancing. But their strength most definitely lies in their strong vocals. iScream's forte is singing a cappella, which is considered to be a highlight of the group.
